Kristiina completed her secondary education at Kirkkonummen lukio in 1992.
Kristiina finished her studies at Haaga-Helia University of Applied Sciences in 1997.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 27 years, Kristiina Pihla Salminen brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Kristiina Pihla Salminen began her professional journey as a Aerospace Engineer at Sulzer Ltd. in 1998, laying the foundation for future success.
She then transitioned to Pilatus Aircraft Ltd. as a Program Manager, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2000 to 2003.
In 2003, she joined RUAG Schweiz AG as a Director of Operations, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
She worked as a VP of Business Development at Sulzer Ltd. from 2007 to 2009, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Since joining Pilatus Aircraft Ltd. as a CEO in 2009, she has established herself as a respected authority, fostering collaboration and pushing boundaries to achieve groundbreaking results.
